website_summaries.verdict: This popular drone is the gold standard for recreational use.  Capable of real-time streaming in high definition at depths to nearly 100 feet.
pros: Drone camera supports 4K streaming and has 64 GB of storage
cons: Though not the most expensive choice, it is still pricey and not to be confused with a toy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: My mom got this for me for my 13th birthday. I used it for about half an hour and it was perfectly fine. Then it started spinning in circles and I couldn’t control it. Eventually, the battery ran out and we retrieved it. I ignored all The reviews on this, but that was a mistake. Please, if you want to get an underwater drone, DO NOT CHOOSE THIS ONE!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MIM

customer_reviews.title: You need calm waters
customer_reviews.text: The drone did not operate as advertised for us. We have a beach property and would have loved to have underwater drone videos. Our beach waves are very small. There's not enough wave action for surfers. The drone was not able to navigate through the surf to get any videos. Be aware that if you return the drone the seller is asking that you pay for return shipping. Advertised as free returns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.text: Setup is a little tough, but it does everything it is supposed too. Only problem I had is trying to figure out which way the nose is pointing when coming back home. If you do buy one, make sure to buy a roller for the cord. Video is hard too see when it's really sunny, also have to watch out for small rocks and clam shells plugging the horizontal motor if you are close to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Aranda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: THis product expands my current capabilities to support underwater surveys within the Chesapeake Bay. My website is captainchuckgassert.org
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RUN WALK OR SWIM AWAY FROM THIS PRODECT
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS LIKE A FUN TOY.STOPS BEING FUN WHEN THERE IS NO SUPPORT FROM THE COMPANY OR ITS DEALERS.THANK GOD AMAZONE HAS A VERY GOOD RETURN POLICY.TRIED FOR DAYS TO GET HELP.ALL CALLS WERE IGNORED.40 CALLS OVER 5 DAYS.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Best quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made,powervision put lot of though into building this drone it was easy to operante i had lots of fun with it,awesome video quality
customer_reviews.author: Don cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Best entertainment for techies
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my brother. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome works as it show
customer_reviews.text: The item works perfect, you have to download the last firmware after that works perfect so easy to do everything, love it
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: PowerRay a great tool.
customer_reviews.text: I received my power ray as advertised.. problem with internal memory card. Called Powervision. They had it shipped back to them, repaired it, sent back than two weeks. The Power ray is great. It does the it’s job (under inspections) well. Use care in weeds and murky water. otherwise recommend power ray. Excellent customer service from PowerVision.
customer_reviews.author: Gbascomb

customer_reviews.title: Useless! If you think it hovers in water - ...
customer_reviews.text: Useless! If you think it hovers in water - you are WRONG! It has a positive buoyancy, and it needs to turn on the thruster to stay underwater at the depth you need. The thruster has a front position, and what the drone does? Yes. It is nodding the head. And your video on your iPad's screen is shaking up and down with intervals of 1 seconds!!! So you can see nothing! It's a HUGE mistake of engineers! Guys. PowerVision is NOT a DJI!! I sold it on the next day after I tested it in my pool.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: A++++++ This ROV Sub was the perfect choice to film TUNA!
customer_reviews.text: Setting up the Powerray was super simple! I am a drone operator so it was super easy learning to pilot it as it’s much like flying a drone. I’m super impressed with the subs quality and 4K video. I needed something that could operate with speed in the ocean current and maneuver fast out of the way of fishing lines and got it with this. Had a hammerhead bit down on her and it only got a little scratch, the plastic is super solid! Love the endless possibilities with this ROV and has been a great addition to our TV show.
customer_reviews.author: kendall Whelpton

customer_reviews.title: It will be a great tool in our evidence collection and underwater searches
customer_reviews.text: The Drone Academy is totally impressed with this platform. It will be a great tool in our evidence collection and underwater searches, inspections, and surveys. The set up and ease of use is a real bonus on this machine, we tested the total package on the Delaware River in swift currents and its performance was flawless. We have plans to use on our next adventure in the Florida Keys, testing underwater surveys on larger vessels and aiding in peir structures, piling inspections and of course looking at the under sea life in a whole new perspective. Need help or training or would like to setup a test drive feel free to reach out to our educators. DroneAcademy.net
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions on how to use it!
customer_reviews.text: I never even got it in the water! You get no instructions with this piece of junk at almost a grand you would sure think they could have some sort of instructions. Got online and found out how to open the box but already had it open sending it back dont bother buying one. Im glad i didnt get it going cuz im sure the long cable would be in a thousand knots and wrapped around something what a joke!
customer_reviews.author: dan sagen

customer_reviews.title: The next evolution
customer_reviews.text: As a 5 year Drone operator/Videographer there's only so much footage you can take without it being the same. Powerray have aced the net evolution of the Drone.. Underwater ROV. Simple to setup, no calibration, easy wifi connect and super easy controller. Drop it in the water and go, it will take some time to orientate the control of the ROV but once you have down its pretty straight forward. 4K camera is great if you have clear waters to dive in, it does take a bit if adjusting via the app to get the correct aperture settings. Overall I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MOSimons

customer_reviews.title: Open water only
customer_reviews.text: Can’t use in ponds or streams that have aquatic plants. Very fragile, will break if you suck up plants.
customer_reviews.author: dave

product_meta.title: PowerVision PRW10 Powerray Wizard Underwater Drone with 4K UHD Camera, Fish Finder & VR Goggles for Diving and Boating, White
product_meta.description: Style:WizardThe power Ray Wizard is ideal for exploring the underwater world for professional purposes with the power vision edition of Zeiss VR one plus Goggles, a 64GB memory card, and a 230ft tether. The power Ray can deep dive up to 98 feet, with the internal Wi-Fi system allowing transmission of images and data over a distance of up to 260 feet. No cables, no hassle
feature_bullets: Innovative underwater drone designed for everyone who wants to explore the underwater world, Whether it be for professional or recreational purposes.
Deep dive - The power Ray can dive as deep as 98 feet underwater. The power Ray base station has a 230ft long waterproof tether connected to the vehicle.
Camera - The fully integrated 4K UHD camera shoots 12MP Still Photos; burst mode shoots up to 5 frames per second.
Equipped with a 64GB SD card. Depth range - 80m. Casting range - 100m

Advanced technology for power Ray wizard only - (1) use the power Seeker fish finder Sonar and magnetic bait drop to locate and place bait at any desired position. (2) the power vision edition of VR goggles offer you a brand new underwater experience in immersed first person view.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars40 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
